Adventure: Top 10 Travel Suggestions for Adrenalin Junkies 
Ecotourism + Responsible Travel 
Forget watching movies in your hotel room, lounging by the swimming pool, sipping signature cocktails at the lobby bar, or having a treatment at a luxurious spa. Here are 10 travel suggestions for serious adrenaline junkies. White Water Rafting in the Rangitata Valley of New Zealand. Photo Credit: Wikimedia Commons. 

Forget riding about in tour buses, following tour guides carrying little flags, and being ushered into souvenir shops, where you are under intense pressure to buy stuff you neither want nor need. 
Adventure travellers want more when they travel. Here are 10 suggested activities for serious adrenaline junkies! Falling into the categories of ecotourism and responsible travel, most of them are eco-friendly and easy on the environment. 
You will find links to official government tourism websites as well recommended tour operators.. 
1. Dive Off a Cliff! Diving into the ocean along the Amalfi Coast in Italy. Photo Credit: Contiki. 
The Amalfi Coast straddles a peninsula between Naples to the North and Salerno to the south along Italy's sun-drenched west coast. Why not dive off a cliff into those azure waters?
